title: How Reddit's Coronavirus Community Became A Global Lifeline
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Redditors share how they're coping with the coronavirus pandemic. We also take an in-depth look at r/coronavirus, which has fast become one of the most comprehensive, up-to-date, and reliable sources of information for this constantly developing global story.
